actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs may furnish medical services for a nonservice-connected disability to any war veteran who has a disability rated at 50 percent or more resulting from a service-connected disability.

summary.text: Provides that the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs may furnish medical services for a non-service-connected disability to any war veteran who has a disability rated at 50 percent or more resulting from a service-connected disability. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 612(b)(3))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs may furnish medical services for a nonservice-connected disability to any war veteran who has a disability rated at 50 percent or more resulting from a service-connected disability.
